data.text: Ee! Màanɔɠɔa! Gè ɠɛa ga naama nui,
Wooɠɛɠila nuiti ti ɓega zooi ɠa,
Ti ɠeleɠelegɛ faa ɲɔi ɠɛɛzu, ti yee la ɠulaa su.
Zɔi pagai ti zaama, naa ɠɛɛʋɛ eɠɛ ɠaingiti ti ɠaalɛai ba,
Mina la è-wɔɔla la,
Mazɔlɔɔ doun zunui ɠa kɛɛɠɛ wɔinzeɠe,
Nɔ̀un nà, nà wɛlɛzu ga Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɔ pelei,
Sìli nui, mina ɠoozunɛ nà-faa zu!
Nà va Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-ziiɠaawanai wu,
Toɠa ɠɛ sìli nuiti gaazu, unfegi lɔ ti ɠaazu,
Wɛlɛ, naama voloi ɠana ʋa,
Naama volo ná, nuiti ta ʋa è ʋɔ bɛ,
Zooi mɔta zu ɠa wo, gaa nuiti maaʋele ma,
Lo ɗa-nuɓusɛiti untuɠɔ ga ɗa-lukpɔi,
Eɠɛ foloi è gi ɠulani la Ezipete yooi ʋa,
Zii ɠiligiti ta ti ʋɛtɛ, ti wola unfe,
Ta fufiligi ɠɔmɔ eɠɛ kaalii,
GALA, ɓɛ ɠa é ga è ɠɛʋele,
Ɗa gi maawɔinɠaazu mɔnɔ,
Ungo, ɗa ɗa-wooɠɛɠiladai ɠula kɛlɛma Zakɔɓe mavofodaiti bɛ.
